document.full_text: when the massive tsunami smacked into fukushima daiichi, the nuclear power plant was stacked high with more uranium than it was originally designed to hold and had repeatedly missed mandatory safety checks over the past decade.
document.title: special report: fuel storage, safety issues vexed japan plant
lines_and_colors: when the massive tsunami smacked into fukushima daiichi, the nuclear power plant was stacked high with more uranium than it was originally designed to hold and had repeatedly missed mandatory safety checks over the past decade.
